column3:
This video is part one of a three-part series on the history of Napoleon. Here, we cover the period from his birth until his nomination as the first Emperor of the french. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geohistory

English translation & voiceover: Rahul Venkit https://www.rahulvenkit.com/
Original French version: https://youtu.be/7JVLqpYmA_Y

Music: Klondike - Audio Hertz (YouTube Library)
Software: Adobe After Effects
